message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $18,000 is a bit out of my price range. I'm very interested in this product, though, and I'm willing to pay $13,000. This is the absolute highest I can go.
I understand that $13,000 is the highest you're willing to pay, but I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.

Alice, I really appreciate you coming down to $16,000, but I'm still a bit too far apart. I can't go higher than $14,000, and if you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to consider my other options.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $14,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $16,000 and $14,000, which would be $15,000. I think that's a fair price for this amazing product.
